ResearchDataEntry.Name: Vici's Mass Storage Mk1
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: Our current mass storage is slow and cumbersome. What if we tried to make a larger cargo hold for the drones?
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: Success! We were able to create a new drone that can carry 5 items at a time! What's more, this same research can be applied to the Mass Crate Modules to make them hold more!

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Vici's Mass Storage Mk2
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: As mining efficiency increases, so too does our mass storage demands. Can we make the drones faster?
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: Through the power of miniaturization, we're now able to make the drone engines 3 times smaller and the drones 3 times faster! This also greatly improves the Mass Crate Modules we have available

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Vici's Mass Storage Mk3
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: We're pulling ores from deep down now and it's piling up - we must improve our throughput!
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: We've greatly improved our storage capabilities. We now have a drone that has a huge cargo hold and a new Mass Crate Module several times better than the last!

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Vici's Mass Storage Mk4
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: We've had the teleporter for some time - what else can we do with it?
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: Whoa! We now have a drone that can teleport to where it needs to go. Unfortunately, it's only a one way trip and the drone still needs to fly back. Also, a new Mass Crate Module!

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Vici's Mass Storage Mk5
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: We fit one teleporter onto a drone, how about 2?
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: While it took a long time, we now have a drone that will teleport to its location and back. We've also found out how to utilize this technology into a few new Mass Crate Modules!
